DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether individual and/ group base neuropsychological rehabilitation focus psychoeducation teach compensatory strategy positive effect psychosocial wellbeing perceived cognitive deficit dyslexic young adult . The hypothesis individual group base neuropsychological rehabilitation show positive effect psychosocial wellbeing perceived cognitive deficit . Another purpose study evaluate weather individual group base neuropsychological rehabilitation different kind effect wellbeing participant weather either one rehabilitation format effective .
DOC.brief_title: The Effectiveness Neuropsychological Rehabilitation Young Dyslexic Adults
DOC.detailed_description: Background : Untreated dyslexia cause problem individual study , work employment . High quality research best cost-effective rehabilitation method need . Objective : To study whether neuropsychological rehabilitation improve psychosocial wellbeing perceived cognitive deficit dyslexic young adult evaluate potential difference individual group base neuropsychological rehabilitation . Methods : Altogether 120 young adult diagnose dyslexia randomize either one intervention group ( individual neuropsychological rehabilitation / group neuropsychological rehabilitation ) control group receive either one intervention 5 month wait period . All study subject assess short neuropsychological test battery well self-rating questionnaire evaluate mood , QoL , perceive cognitive deficit , impact learn disability baseline , five month ( immediately intervention control period ) 10 month . After 20 month short follow-up use self-ratings do via mail . Subjects intervention group offer neuropsychological rehabilitation 12 session conduct week two week five month . Subjects control group receive intervention first five month . Results : The effect intervention psychosocial wellbeing perceived cognitive deficit evaluate use appropriate statistical procedure compare difference intervention group control group . The present status : All intervention complete , follow-up data still beeing collect
